headline: Is Broadcom (AVGO) Still Sensibly Priced After A 5x Three Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Broadcom's share price still makes sense after a huge run in recent years, you are not alone and the numbers tell an interesting story. The stock closed at US$343.58 most recently, after a 1.8% decline over the last week and a 12.0% decline over the past month, even though the 1 year return sits at 51.6% and the 3 year gain is very large at around 5x. Recent headlines have focused on Broadcom's role in key semiconductor markets and its position in large scale...

content.title: Is Broadcom (AVGO) Still Sensibly Priced After A 5x Three Year Share Price Surge
content.summary: If you are wondering whether Broadcom's share price still makes sense after a huge run in recent years, you are not alone and the numbers tell an interesting story. The stock closed at US$343.58 most recently, after a 1.8% decline over the last week and a 12.0% decline over the past month, even though the 1 year return sits at 51.6% and the 3 year gain is very large at around 5x. Recent headlines have focused on Broadcom's role in key semiconductor markets and its position in large scale...

headline: AI ‘Fatigue’ Leaves Investors Focused on S&P’s Other 493 Stocks
summary: A growing number of investors are now wagering that run, led by the Magnificent Seven, is about to end.  Mounting concerns about AI’s ability to deliver seismic changes on the American economy — and the fat profits that would come with them — has turned investor euphoria about the technology into agita.  “I call it ‘AI fatigue,’” said Ed Yardeni, president and chief investment strategist at the eponymous Yardeni Research.

content.title: AI ‘Fatigue’ Leaves Investors Focused on S&P’s Other 493 Stocks
content.summary: A growing number of investors are now wagering that run, led by the Magnificent Seven, is about to end.  Mounting concerns about AI’s ability to deliver seismic changes on the American economy — and the fat profits that would come with them — has turned investor euphoria about the technology into agita.  “I call it ‘AI fatigue,’” said Ed Yardeni, president and chief investment strategist at the eponymous Yardeni Research.

headline: Broadcom (AVGO) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Hock Tan: Thank you, Ji, and thank you, everyone for joining us today.  Now we started the year providing annual guidance with quarterly updates as we run the process of integrating VMware.  In Q3, infrastructure software segment revenue of $5.8 billion was up 200% year-on-year driven by $3.8 billion in revenue contribution from VMware.

content.title: Broadcom (AVGO) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript
content.summary: Hock Tan: Thank you, Ji, and thank you, everyone for joining us today.  Now we started the year providing annual guidance with quarterly updates as we run the process of integrating VMware.  In Q3, infrastructure software segment revenue of $5.8 billion was up 200% year-on-year driven by $3.8 billion in revenue contribution from VMware.
